CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 13, 1954, pg. 12 reads: "Musical Salon - Artists who took part in last month's musical salon, given by Marie Carter Hayes, included Mrs. Hayes' son, James; young Vernetta Bagley and a charming ensemble directed by John Griffin. Pictured at the piano, James Hayes and Lucille Carter.  Standing are John Horton, John Griffin, Mrs. Evelyn Cash, Florence Hughes Wasler, violinist; Ethel Burleigh and Danny McCullum. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: James Hayes and Lucille Carter seated at piano, and John Horton, John Griffin, Evelyn Cash, Florence Hughes Wasler, Ethel Burleigh, and Danny McCullum standing beside them in Hayes School of Music, 6490 Frankstown Avenue, East Liberty
